attributes.action: Change building regulations to force new buildings to be at least partially self sufficent in energy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: New buildings should be forced to use new renewable technologies like ground source heating, solar roofing tiles and wind turbines to provide a reasonable percentage of their energy. A "cellular" approach to renewable energy has the most chance off success and would not cause the same issues as large scale wind farms.
